QuestData.Title: Curing With Force
QuestData.Description: The infection is getting stronger so I made some adjustments and I'm pretty sure I have the right formula now.$b$bIt should now work but it needs to have less competition with the infected blood for it to have any effect.$b$bThis means you will need to weaken them before you apply the serum for it to function properly.$b$bThe infection is getting more advanced and will soon be untreatable so we have this one shot to save as many as we can.
QuestData.CompletionText: Any progress to report with that cure?
QuestData.RewardText: Yea! Great work, $n!$b$bI've already heard from the survivors and they're glad for this second chance at life.$b$bYou made a real difference today!
